title: The Elite Class Can’t Stand You (Ep 1445)
description:
In this episode, I discuss the real reason why the GameStop story horrifies government and big business elites. It’s not about stocks, there’s more behind this. 

News Picks:

The Spectator article about the American Oligarchy, discussed in the show. 

The White House says they’re “monitoring” the GameStop situation.


Ridiculous. Discord bans the wallstreetbets server. 


Tucker Carlson responds to the GameStop saga. 

An EMP attack would be catastrophic. The Russians and the Chinese know this. 

“You can kick their balls, but you can’t touch them”?
